description: Amendments to planning permission dated 17 December 2021 (RN: 20/04966/FULL) for 'Demolition of existing building, extension of existing basement and erection of a new building of ground, mezzanine, plus up to fourteen-storeys with terraces at tenth to fourteenth floor level, comprising office accommodation; flexible retail, restaurant, bar, community and leisure uses; internal pedestrian route with 'Village Square', plant at main roof level; servicing, cycle parking and highways, landscaping and associated works'. Namely, adjustments to internal retaining wall of basement; relocation of UKPN substation and updated layout within basement; reconfiguration of internal core and WC layouts; provision of level access to terraces; reduction to some parapet levels; relocation of BMU parking garage; amendments to north and south facade cleaning system; consolidation of roof space to west of plant enclosure; updates to ground floor public realm design; amendments to entrances, door and corridor widths for fire safety; amendments to location of exterior facade doors to terraces; design changes to spandrel on wall type WT-3; and omission of rooftop louvred screen.
